thread.title: Elwira Baclawska

author: Elwira Baclawska
title: Elwira Baclawska
text: I booked my flight over 2 months in advance. Few days before flight I got an info that it has been cancelled.They offered unacceptable other flight with different airport , with an overnight stop. I didn't get my money back....( over 500$), they say the airline doesn't want to give me a refund ( Virgin Atlantic) but I do not believe them If you do not want to lose your money stay away...Terrible experience. Never again
